message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to compromise a little. Let's split it 55/45.  This way we both get a bit more than before, and we can finally move on!
Getting a bit impatient here... Meet me in the middle of our last offers?
Alright, Bob, I'm getting a little tired of this.  Let's make a deal.  60/40. This is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
